reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: No surprises for us. Directly across from the beach and has Flo's Crab Shack next door. A little unconventional layout with parking on ground level, topped with reception and pool on the second level.
reviews.title: Nice place at great location

reviews.text: A little pricey compared to other Comfort Inns we stayed in this vacation, I'm sure because of the beach location.
reviews.title: As one would expect

likes.disliked: — Internet connection was a bit of a pain at first.

reviews.text: No problems and I would return.
reviews.title: Excellent staff, friendly - Typical chain hotel room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As several advisor's have written you get exactly what you'd expect to get for a Comfort Inn chain hotel. The hotel has a nice location, reasonable prices and delivers good bedding, tv, showers, and morning continental breakfast. Room size is fine and we stayed in a room with two double beds with two teenage boys. Good place to call base camp for a weekend in Newport. The cliff walk is close by, as are the mansions, but as an advisor wrote probably a bit more of a walk than most are willing to take. Of course free parking so you can easily drive into the Newport action and walk around. Good place to stay if you're looking to shave a few bucks off a Newport stay and it's clean, with all the amenities you'd expect. Plus the free breakfast to take the edge off the family in the morning.
reviews.title: Great stay, exactly what was expected

likes.liked: — Loacted right where we needed to be

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: First off, the main floor (floor 1) is actually the 2nd floor as this hotel is elevated and parking is located underneath. We checked in (which went smoothly) but we arrived at our room to find a single king sized bed when we had requested two double beds. We went down to the front desk and the woman was understanding and helpful. She was on the job less than a month and had trouble switching our rooms (the hotel was full that weekend). She thought there was another room but couldn't get the computer to cooperate. She let us know that a more experienced woman would be at work in an hour and to try then. Sure enough when we came back in an hour the greeted us with a smile and handed us our new keys. Almost didn't have to say a word! We thanked them and went to our room, our problem resolved.
reviews.title: Very nice and not too pricey

likes.liked: — Less expensive than staying in Newport & Manager knew everyone's name & treated them well.

reviews.text: We stayed here while attending a wedding in the area.
reviews.title: Mixed Feelings

reviews.title: Great stay!

reviews.text: location-right across the street from 1st beach
reviews.title: Don't Miss This one!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We decided to go to Newport for a few nights over the Memorial Day weekend...what a great location right across the street from the beach...You get 10% off your bill at the Atlantic Beach club restaurant across the street...fun place...bands play there on the weekend...and you get 10% off your bill at Tickets (sports bar next door)...
reviews.title: Nice Memorial Day Getaway!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Flos clam shack is awesome...good clam strips...greek pizza restaurnat in walking distance...package stores, convenient stores all nearby...
reviews.title: Great Location and Amenities

reviews.text: Cliff walk is great...get a nice view of the mansions and a great walk in..
reviews.title: Convenient Choice for Newport

reviews.text: Can't beat the beach right across the street...
reviews.title: Great Place to Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: continential breakfast...the waffles are the best part...coffee nice and hot...for a big hotel room is very small...and people from the sister hotel Best Western come over for the breakfast also...
reviews.title: Convenient and Clean!

likes.liked: — It was clean and everything looked up to date/new!
